devdoc.details: Contract is used by the Parity client and its address is specified in the chainspec

checkRewardPeriodEnded().return: True if the reward period has ended, false otherwise

params._currentBlock: The block number to calculate the reward to

getBlockReward(uint256).return: The block reward amount in wei

reward(address[],uint16[]).details: It is a service transaction invoked by system, which doesn't cost anyhting but still can modify state. Cannot emit events.

params.benefactors: List of addresses that can be rewarded
params.kind: List of type codes belonging to the benefactors. They determine the category an address belongs to. 0 is for block authors which we are only interested in

reward(address[],uint16[]).return: List of addreses to be rewarded, and list of corresponding reward amounts in wei

params._newPayoutAddress: The payout address belonging to the sender

devdoc.title: Block reward contract

checkRewardPeriodEnded().notice: Checks whether the reward period is over or not (block and community)

getBlockReward(uint256).notice: Returns the block reward amount based on the block number and points of the S curve

resetPayoutAddress().notice: Resets the payout address. If a payout address is reseted/not set, the minted amounts get sent to the original one. The sender resets its own  payout address

reward(address[],uint16[]).notice: The function that is called by the client to issue rewards at a new block. The rewards are minted: the balances of the corresponing addresses are simply increased with the amount

setCommunityFund(address).notice: Sets community fund address. Ideally it is a multisig wallet address

setPayoutAddress(address).notice: Sets payout address. Every sender can only set its own payout address. The contract only rewards block authors, but it is not checking who sets an address for itself. The community fund  can set a payout address too, if desired.

userdoc.notice: Performs payouts at each new created block. Block authors are rewarded according to an S-curve, while there is a constant payout for a community fund for a certain period of time.
